content:
Sometime this evening at DavDays we'll do 2 informal pop-ups for the tooling people;

  • Packaging discussion (ids, and composition of base packages)
  • Slicing on choice elements in profiles

I'll announce actual times later - but indicate by :+1: if you're interested in attending
I want to attend the packaging discussion
I want to attend the slicing discussion

ok. Sonara this evening
6:30 packaging and composition
7:15 slicing and choice types
